Convo: ^Oh! Hey Harvey! I really like this barn you got for us to use tonight.

c-0: ^Thank god you like it! It's not what I was expecting so I figured it would turn out bad.
c-1: ^Wait, you don't hate it? I figured with all the junk and hay everywhere that you'd have an issue with it.

C1: ^Well it did take a bit of getting used to while we were playing. I was f-fighting a sneeze for a few minutes while playing and it was torture.

c-0: ^Yeah, the dust really doesn't help out that much with that. But hey! It doesn't seem like it messed you up too much while playing, so that's good.
^That's t-true. Let's hope it doesn't bother me as much for the rest of the night.
c-1: ^I'll keep that in mind if we wanna play here again. I could bring some fans or something to try and get the dust outside. Maybe some brooms would be nice as well.
^This place would definitely need a c-cleaning before we play here again. Not too much though or it'll ruin the ambiance it gives off.

C2: ^Well it is a tad bit overwhelming at times, but it's still kinda neat. It gives the place a personality.

c-0: ^Huh. I didn't think of it that way. I guess you're right. It's an interesting personality for sure.
^See? Now you get it. Make sure to brush out the hay from your fur later though.
c-1: ^I still think it could use a bit more work though. But never mind that for now. It works for tonight and that's all that matters.
^Exactly! Seems like the crowd is fine with it too, so it all worked out.
